page.title: 04Vicki - a typical morning.
page.content: Every morning I get up and I get dressed in my uniform which is a set of clothes that I wear for my school.I then go into the bathroom which is a room that has got a sink which is white and used for putting water in it and you have a wash. We also have a bath which is bigger than the sink, which we can wash our whole body in. After I have washed I go downstairs and have my breakfast which is usually milk, cereals and a drink of tea. I then go back to the bathroom and clean my teeth. After that I make sure I have everything I need in my school bag and walk to school.
